rules: Return ONLY a single JSON object. No markdown fences, no prose, no backticks.
Do not assume Linux paths like /usr/bin unless OS is Linux and you verified they exist.
Prefer command checks (python --version, ollama --help, curl -s http://localhost:11434/api/tags).
Keep steps minimal and deterministic (no randomness, no network calls to external domains).
Do not include placeholders like ${env_info.cwd} or ${...}.
All run_cmd.args.cmd values must be a single string command valid for the detected OS.
Do not use snapshot_create or snapshot_restore (handled by orchestrator).
All write_file tool calls must include args.path and args.content (string).
All C# files must be written with complete compilable class definitions, not partial lines.
Never use write_file to create directories. Use run_cmd (mkdir) or rely on the orchestrator to create dirs.
